generated.css: .footer-bottom .xt-ph-edit .placeholder-help-text{color:#eee}.xt-ph-edit{border:2px dashed #55accc;min-height:20px;cursor:pointer;padding:.2rem;margin-bottom:10px;position:relative}.xt-ph-edit:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;left:0;height:100%;width:100%;transition:all .3s;opacity:0;background:#55accc;z-index:100}.xt-ph-edit>*{pointer-events:none}.xt-ph-edit:hover{border-style:solid}.xt-ph-edit:hover:before{opacity:.5}.xt-ph-edit .xt-toolbar{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;margin:auto}.xt-ph-edit .xt-toolbar .configure{padding:20px;font-size:20px}.xt-ph-edit .placeholder-help-text{text-align:center;font-style:italic;color:#000;font-size:14px!important;border-bottom:2px solid #55accc;padding-bottom:5px}.xt-edit-toggle{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;padding:.9rem 1rem}.xt-edit-toggle button{-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;border:0;background:#55accc!important;color:#fff!important;font-size:14px!important;padding:6px 12px;border-radius:4px;font-weight:700;transition:background .1s}.xt-edit-toggle button:focus,.xt-edit-toggle button:hover{background:#41a2c6!important}#xt-edit-sidebar{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;position:fixed;z-index:999999;left:0;top:0;bottom:0;width:450px;transform:translateX(-100%) translateZ(0);transition:transform .5s;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 0 4px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15)}#xt-edit-sidebar.visible{transform:translateX(0)}#xt-edit-sidebar.visible .xt-sidebar-toggler i:before{content:"\f100"}#xt-edit-sidebar iframe{position:absolute;border:0;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;border-bottom:1px solid #ddd}#xt-edit-sidebar .xt-sidebar-toggler{position:fixed;left:100%;bottom:1rem;padding:6px 12px;background:#fff;text-align:center;z-index:10;border-top-right-radius:4px;border-bottom-right-radius:4px;font-weight:700;color:#55accc;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:2px 0 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.05);white-space:nowrap;font-size:12px}#xt-edit-sidebar .xt-sidebar-toggler i{margin-right:5px}#xt-edit-sidebar .xt-sidebar-toggler i:before{content:"\f101"}
